definition: easily broken or damaged or destroyed, a basket for holding dried fruit (especially raisins or figs)
details:
adjective
- easily broken or damaged or destroyed
= synonyms: delicate
- wanting in moral strength, courage, or will
= synonyms: weak
- physically weak
= example: physically weak
noun
- a basket for holding dried fruit (especially raisins or figs)
- the weight of a frail (basket) full of raisins or figs
